property.name: type1
property.formula: (select case when count(*)>0 then 1 else 2 end from t_a_Firmmargin t where t.firmid = firmID and t.commodityid = commodityID and (t.marginItem1=t.marginItem1_S and t.marginItemAssure1=t.marginItemAssure1_S))

property.name: type2
property.formula: (select case when count(*)>0 then 1 else 2 end from t_a_Firmmargin t where t.firmid = firmID and t.commodityid = commodityID and (t.marginItem2=t.marginItem2_S and t.marginItemAssure2=t.marginItemAssure2_S))

property.name: type3
property.formula: (select case when count(*)>0 then 1 else 2 end from t_a_Firmmargin t where t.firmid = firmID and t.commodityid = commodityID and (t.marginItem3=t.marginItem3_S and t.marginItemAssure3=t.marginItemAssure3_S))

property.name: type4
property.formula: (select case when count(*)>0 then 1 else 2 end from t_a_Firmmargin t where t.firmid = firmID and t.commodityid = commodityID and (t.marginItem4=t.marginItem4_S and t.marginItemAssure4=t.marginItemAssure4_S))

property.name: type5
property.formula: (select case when count(*)>0 then 1 else 2 end from t_a_Firmmargin t where t.firmid = firmID and t.commodityid = commodityID and (t.marginItem5=t.marginItem5_S and t.marginItemAssure5=t.marginItemAssure5_S))
